name: Mirror Manor
description:
Do you love dark rooms and are scared of the sunlight? Than this is the perfect multiplayer game for you and your friends!

Play as a Vampire and try to move your silver Mirror in the right direction to hit your opponent with the deadly sunlight! But be careful! The walls have mirrors to and could bounce the light right back!

Are you ready for a fun time with your friends? Let's go!
